name: The floor is LAVA! animation MEME: The game
name_original: The floor is LAVA! animation MEME: The game
description:
Watch out! The floor is lava!

Hello everyone! I want to introduce you to our 2D game!

Just a little silly game... xD It's inspired by one MEME animation and we don't expect anything bigger from that game.

There are smaller texture glitches, etc. It's just for fun.

Authors:

Main programmer: Sovicka

Artist/animations: ArchShiranui
